altername_name: My Chinese Coach: Learn to Speak Chinese
Mi Experto en Chino: Aprende a Hablar Chino
My Chinese Coach: Learn a New Language
name: My Chinese Coach
overview: Learn Chinese in a fun and interactive way. Learn Chinese using carefully structured lessons that guide the player through vocabulary and calligraphy exercises. Learn the basic pronunciations unique to the Mandarin language. Use the Nintendo DS stylus to properly write Chinese Kanji Characters. Entertaining and relevant mini-games - play through a series of fun and informative mini-games that reinforces the lesson content for the player.
